about-me.title: About me
about-me.text: Hi there, I am a frontend developer based in Mannheim.I used to work as a logistics specialist but after a traffic accident, I had to take a different career path. Since I've always been interested in IT and development, I saw this as a new opportunity and turned my dream into reality.
about-me.text-2: I enjoy finding the optimal solution for an existing problem to ensure that the end-user has an unforgettable experience.
about-me.text-3: Since I don't just see development as a job but as a vocation, I continuously educate myself further.

my-skills.title: My skills
my-skills.text: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join-project.text: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

el-pollo-loco.text: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the killer chicken.

contact.title: Contact
contact.headline: Got a problem to solve?
contact.text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.text-2: I am looking forward to hearing from you!
contact.privacy-policy: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
